page.title: 18A Typical Day
page.content: My name is Jamie Oliver.I am nine years old.I live in Perranporth.I have no brothers or sisters.I get up at8am each week day.For breakfast I have rice crispies and coffee.Then I get my swimming kit and wait around.I catch the bus at 8.30am.It is a Liskey Tours mini-bus.At 9am the bell and whistle go for registration.Then we have assembly.I do swimming,maths,reading, language and project.At 12 noon we have lunch in the hall.Most children have packed dinners but I have school dinners.At 3.30pm the bell goes and I catch the bus to go home.I get changed first then I go out to play.I play football or ride my bike on The Mound.Then I have tea.After tea I go out to play again.Mum calls me in to get ready for bed.I go to bed at 8.00pm.
